quotes.quote: Yoga is the journey of the self, through the self, to the self.
quotes.author: The Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Yoga is not about touching your toes. It's about what you learn on the way down.
quotes.author: Jigar Gor

quotes.quote: Yoga is not just repetition of few postures - it is more about the exploration and discovery of the subtle energies of life.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Yoga teaches us to cure what need not be endured and endure what cannot be cured.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Yoga is the art of awareness on the canvas of body, mind, and soul.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Yoga is not a religion. It is a science, science of well-being, science of youthfulness, science of integrating body, mind and soul.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Yoga is a light, which once lit, will never dim. The better your practice, the brighter your flame.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Yoga is not a work-out, it is a work-in. And this is the point of spiritual practice; to make us teachable; to open up our hearts and focus our awareness so that we can know what we already know and be who we already are.
quotes.author: Rolf Gates

quotes.quote: Yoga is a dance between control and surrender - between pushing and letting go - and when to push and when to let go becomes part of the creative process, part of the open-ended exploration of your being.
quotes.author: Joel Kramer

quotes.quote: Yoga is the fountain of youth. You're only as young as your spine is flexible.
quotes.author: Bob Harper

quotes.quote: Yoga is the journey of the self, to the self, through the self.
quotes.author: The Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Yoga is a way of moving into stillness in order to experience the truth of who you are.
quotes.author: Erich Schiffmann

quotes.quote: Yoga is a way to freedom. By its constant practice, we can free ourselves from fear, anguish and loneliness.
quotes.author: Indra Devi

quotes.quote: Yoga is a science, and not a vague dreamy drifting or imagining. It is an applied science, a systematized collection of laws applied to bring about a definite end.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: Yoga is the perfect opportunity to be curious about who you are.
quotes.author: Jason Crandell
